title: Trump indictment live updates: Cohen would be key trial witness, attorney says
description: Live updates and latest coverage as former President Donald Trump is expected to be arraigned in New York on Tuesday. He is facing about 30 charges in the state related to document fraud.

title: At least 11 dead as tornadoes batter the South and Midwest
description: At least 11 people are dead after a major storm system ripped through several states in the Midwest and the South bringing tornadoes and severe thunderstorms Friday and overnight.

title: Remote trains carrying hazmat fall outside Congress' push for rail regulation
description: WASHINGTON — Congress is pushing to mandate a specific crew size on trains following a series of dangerous incidents.

title: Can an app build generational wealth? These Latina creators say yes
description: The Latina creators behind the SUMA app, aimed at making financial planning engaging to Gen Z young adults, say their mission is to close the Latino wealth gap.

title: Two New Yorkers tried to leave Brazil with 77 pounds of gold in their luggage
description: Experts say the ease with which the two men obtained the 77 pounds of questionable gold underscores the challenges of cracking down on a trade that fuels environmental destruction and enriches international criminal groups.

title: Far-right influencer convicted in 2016 voter suppression scheme
description: A self-styled far-right propagandist from Florida was convicted of charges alleging he conspired to deprive people of their right to vote in the 2016 election.

title: Federal judge temporarily halts Tennessee's 'drag ban' law
description: A federal judge in Tennessee on Friday temporarily halted the state’s new law that criminalizes some drag performances.

title: 81-year-old best friends travel the world in 80 days
description: NBC’s Ellison Barber has the amazing story of two best friends who are reminding the world that age is just a number after traveling around the world in 80 days at the age of 81.

title: Mississippi Legislature votes to expand Capitol Police over objections from Jackson lawmakers
description: The Mississippi Capitol Police would be able to patrol the entire city of Jackson under a bill that passed the state Legislature this week.

title: Online threats of violence but few signs of far-right organizing around Trump indictment
description: Minutes after news broke of former President Donald Trump’s indictment, a comment on the pro-Trump internet forum Patriots.win, also known as TheDonald, skyrocketed to the top of the message board.
